title: Strings and Runes | Challenge
description: This challenge focuses on Go strings and runes. In Go, strings are read-only slices of bytes, and runes are integers that represent Unicode code points. This challenge will explore how to work with strings and runes in Go.

meta.title: Go Strings and Runes | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the intricacies of working with strings and runes in Go, a powerful programming language. Learn how to handle string length, index, rune count, and iterate through runes.
meta.keywords: Go, strings, runes, programming tutorials, coding challenges, Unicode, character manipulation

verify.name: Verify Strings and Runes Program Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 字符串与符文（rune）| 挑战
i18n.description: 本次挑战聚焦于Go语言中的字符串和符文。在Go语言中，字符串是只读的字节切片，而符文是表示Unicode码点的整数。本次挑战将探索如何在Go语言中处理字符串和符文。

meta.title: Go语言中的字符串与符文 | 编程教程
meta.description: 探索在强大的编程语言Go中处理字符串和符文的复杂性。学习如何处理字符串长度、索引、符文计数以及遍历符文。
meta.keywords: Go语言, 字符串, 符文, 编程教程, 编码挑战, Unicode, 字符操作

verify.name: 验证字符串与符文程序输出
